name: true-html-escape
description: True module to escape and unescape html, including some unicode unescaping like `〹` that other escaping modules don't include.
readme: True Html Escape ================ True module to escape and unescape html, including some unicode unescaping like `〹` that other escaping modules don't include. > Thanks to the base module [node-escapist](https://github.com/vpukhanov/node-escapist). Installation ---------------- From npm: ```sh $ npm install true-html-escape ``` From repo: ```sh git clone https://github.com/XadillaX/true-html-escape.git ``` By [ZIP](https://github.com/XadillaX/true-html-escape/archive/master.zip). Usage ---------------- ```javascript var escaper = require("true-html-escape"); escaper.escape("¤¥€"); ///<= ¤¥€ escaper.unescape("<span>王尼玛</span>"); ///<= 王尼玛 escaper.unescape("フランドール"); ///<= フランドール escaper.unescape("(╭￣3￣)╭♡") ///<= (╭￣3￣)╭♡ ``` > 所以说这货为了反转义一些非常恶心的 Unicode 转义编码，而 [npm](https://www.npmjs.org/search?q=escape%20html) 貌似找不到。 Contribute ---------------- You're welcome to improve this module. Please contact me or just push request. Thanks.
